title: Strange champion issue
body:
I just recently just finshed my new pc and i jumped into a custom game to check frames. Gettting 800 frames and 40 ping. which is great and all. But
when ever i play any champion they jump back and fourth all over the place like it's lagging. The entire game is fine, neather the monster's or creep's are lagging, just my champion. If anyone has experienced this or whould know how to fix it i would appreciate it. thanks!

replies.body: There could be game files or outdated drivers causing your fps to drop a bit.  I suggest using the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your new rig for the.  Grats on that!
